FuncDef: This command instructs the system to redirect traffic to the corresponding PXC interface associated with the configured FPE when the destination IP address matches the configured tunnel termination IP address. Because the IP address is registered, the system can respond to ICMP packets directed to it.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the non-system IPv4 or IPv6 address that terminates the VXLAN. Values-ip-address: a.b.c.d.
Specifies the FPE identifier associated with the PXC port or LAG that processes and terminates the VXLAN. Values-1 to 64.
Mandatory keyword to create the FPE.
